plot: Accused of treason against the Wizards of the White Council, Warden Morgan goes in search of Harry Dresden in a desperate attempt to clear his name and stop the deadly punishment from taking place in this latest thrilling addition to the Dresden Files series.
characters: Thomas Raith, Molly Carpenter, Anastasia Luccio, Donald Morgan, Toot-toot, Waldo Butters, Ebenezer McCoy, Captain Anastasia Luccio, Justine, Lara Raith, Karrin Murphy, Harry Dresden, Billy Borden
